for z in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    s = input()
    a = 0
    b = 0
    ra = n
    rb = n
    for i in range(2 * n):
        if i % 2 == 0:
            a += int(s[i])
            ra -= 1
        else:
            b += int(s[i])
            rb -= 1
        if a > b + rb or b > a + ra or (ra == 0 and rb == 0):
            print(i + 1)
            break

p = int(input())
for i in range(p):
    n = int(input())
    (at, bt, a_s, bs, ans) = (n, n, 0, 0, 0)
    s = input()
    for i in range(len(s)):
        k = int(s[i])
        if i % 2 != 0:
            bs = bs + k
            bt -= 1
        elif i % 2 == 0:
            a_s = a_s + k
            at -= 1
        a = a_s
        b = bs
        if a > b and a - b > bt:
            print(i + 1)
            ans = 1
            break
        elif b > a and b - a > at:
            print(i + 1)
            ans = 1
            break
    if ans == 0:
        print(2 * n)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    turns = int(input())
    aturns = turns
    bturns = turns
    ascore = 0
    bscore = 0
    flag = 0
    s = input()
    for i in range(len(s)):
        k = int(s[i])
        if i % 2 != 0:
            bscore = bscore + k
            bturns -= 1
        elif i % 2 == 0:
            ascore = ascore + k
            aturns -= 1
        a = ascore
        b = bscore
        if a > b and a - b > bturns:
            print(i + 1)
            flag = 1
            break
        elif b > a and b - a > aturns:
            print(i + 1)
            flag = 1
            break
    if flag == 0:
        print(2 * turns)

t = int(input())
for j in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    s = list(input())
    anum = 0
    bnum = 0
    aleft = n
    bleft = n
    ans = 2 * n
    a = []
    b = []
    for i in range(2 * n):
        if i % 2 == 0:
            if s[i] == '1':
                anum = anum + 1
            aleft -= 1
        else:
            if s[i] == '1':
                bnum = bnum + 1
            bleft -= 1
        if anum > bnum + bleft:
            ans = i + 1
            break
        elif bnum > anum + aleft:
            ans = i + 1
            break
    print(ans)
